content.question: An interference pattern is formed on a distant screen when monochromatic laser light is incident on two closely spaced slits. Initially, interference pattern A is created. A change is made to the setup, and then interference pattern B is created. Which of the following indicates a possible change to the setup?

choices.label: The wavelength of the laser light decreased.
The spacing of the slits decreased.
The distance from the slits to the screen increased.
The width of the slits increased.

content.answer: The wavelength of the laser light decreased.

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
